text: hi head squeezers dan Schreiber here
with some exciting news on Thursday the

we are going to be doing a Google+

artificial intelligence contest and
joining us on the show we have the man
himself dr. Hugh Loebner who will also

did Sherlock survive is bull what are

to life the universe and everything any
